metadata.name: Configure SSSD to Expire SSH Known Hosts
metadata.description:
SSSD should be configured to expire keys from known SSH hosts after {{{ xccdf_value("var_sssd_ssh_known_hosts_timeout") }}} seconds. To configure SSSD to known SSH hosts, set ssh_known_hosts_timeout to {{{ xccdf_value("var_sssd_ssh_known_hosts_timeout") }}} under the [ssh] section in /etc/sssd/sssd.conf. For example: 
[ssh]
ssh_known_hosts_timeout = {{{ xccdf_value("var_sssd_ssh_known_hosts_timeout") }}}
metadata.rationale:
If cached authentication information is out-of-date, the validity of the
authentication information may be questionable.
